attributes.action:
Dean Suter for Prime minister , 
a working class individual a regular person .
attributes.background: I am Just a regular British working class man called Dean Suter , id like to have a crack at running the country as i am on the same level as my fellow Great Britons and id like to think i would make a difference as i was born amongst the working lower and middle class . Vote for me' Toodle OO'

rejection.details:
In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.

After a general election, the Queen decides who to invite to form a Government. In practice, this is usually the leader of the political party that wins the most seats in a general election.You can find out more about this here:

http://www.royal.gov.uk/MonarchUK/QueenandGovernment/QueenandPrimeMinister.aspx

If you would like to be prime minister, you could consider standing for election to Parliament. You can find out more about standing for election here:

http://www.parliament.uk/get-involved/elections/standing/
